participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, introspective, and passionate about music and philosophy.
participant_1.background: I m a vegan. I have a tattoo of an angel on my hip. I love going to concerts. My eyes are brown. I study philosophy at umass.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back, artistic, and has a keen interest in music and collecting.
participant_2.background: I play the bass. I have a large cd collection. I collect stamps. I like vintage furniture.

content.text: What's your favorite type of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Me too! I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I also like the Doors, the Who, and Pink Floyd.
Oh, I love the Doors! They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
Me too! They're so original and creative.
I know, right? Jim Morrison was a genius.
He was! I love his lyrics.
Me too! They're so poetic and meaningful.
I also like the Doors' music. It's so unique and catchy.
Me too! I love their songs "Light My Fire" and "Break on Through."
Me too! Those are two of my favorite songs of all time.
Have you ever seen the Doors live?
No, I never had the chance. I wish I had though.
Me too! I would have loved to see them in concert.
They would have been an amazing show.
I know, right? They're one of the best bands of all time.
